titles.title: Equal Justice for Our Military Act
To amend title 28, United States Code, to enable the Supreme Court to review decisions in which the Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces denied relief.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 3/17/2005--Introduced. Equal Justice for Our Military Act - Amends the Federal judicial code to authorize U.S. Supreme Court review of decisions in which the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces denied relief.
